hasDitaContent.@value: Both pixantrone and vinorelbine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  pixantrone  and  vinorelbine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with pixantrone. UKHSA advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   pixantrone .  UKHSA advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .
